colorPicker1.name: Main colour picker
colorPicker1.descDesktop: Appears when you click the colour bubble.
colorPicker1.descMobile: Appears when you tap the colour bubble.

colorPicker2.name: Second colour picker
colorPicker2.descDesktop: Appears when you secondary-click the colour bubble.
colorPicker2.descMobile: Appears when you press & hold the colour bubble.

uncolorHover.name: Colourless hover
uncolorHover.desc: Disable icon colour while hovering an item.

uncolorDrag.name: Colourless drag
uncolorDrag.desc: Disable icon colour while dragging an item.

uncolorSelect.name: Colourless selection
uncolorSelect.desc: Disable icon colour while item is selected.
